p.d: Béatrice realises that her current organisation leaves little room for her relationship with Gabriel. Bernard returns from Haiti, offering Gin an exciting project. Béatrice wants to solve the hospital staffing problem and, at the same time, afford herself more time for her private life. Not everyone agrees with her decision... Directed by: Alexis Durand-Brault (season 4, Canada, 2016) Screenplay, dialogues: Francine Tougas Cast: Sophie Lorain (Béatrice), Gabriel Arcand (Mr P), Vincent Graton (Gabriel), Pierre-Luc Brillant (Olivier-Luc), Linda Sorgini (Gin), Gabriel Sabourin (Benoît), Robert Lalonde (Christophe), Marie-France Lambert (Isabelle), Monique Spaziani (Bernadette), Marie Turgeon (Lucie), Virginie Ranger-Beauregard (Véronique), Rosalie Moreau (Océanne), Rachel Graton (Caroline), Mathieu Quesnel (Luc), Alain Zouvi (Bernard), Levi Doré (Zacharie) Genre: drama
